divs: Sighting Detailsmy father and i were burning brush in a feild on our small farm three miles from cowpens south carolina.i was just looking up at the stars .i first thought they were airforce jets.there were 5 round lights in a triangular shape.when they first appeared they were on eastern horizo nn at a very high altitude.then they streaked across to the western horizon and stopped for about 30 seconds.then they made a right angle turn staight up into outerspace or somewhere out of sight.while watching these objects my father and i did not speak.we just stood there in amazement
Summary: five lights appeared in the sky then streaked across and then stopped then made right angle turn up out of sight
